labels: Graphic User Interface GUI agnostic graphics systems allegro 5 backend
name: Eagle5GUI
short_description:
Full abstraction of system, graphics, events, timers, input, key/mouse/joystick/touch, simplicity and control over input, all with a whopping GUI on top of it. Allegro 5 backend is fully functional, and support for SDL/SFML is intended in the future.

summary: Graphics library abstraction and full GUI
